cookies.info:
A cookie is a small piece of text that websites you visit send to your browser. 
Cookies allow sites to remember information about your visit, which can make the sites easier to revisit and more useful to you.

home.title2: We are a creative agency that believes in the motivating and inspiring power of stories. We are dedicated to Branding, Advertising, and Digital Marketing.

manifest.claim: We practice the Storybuilding Experience above all things.
manifest.lefttext: We believe in the inspiring and motivating power of stories so that others feel your brand as much as we do, as part of our lives.
manifest.subtitle: Manifest
manifest.title: What do we believe?

bottom.topleft: We are into disruption, hard work, pushing boundaries, creating, dreaming and living to the fullest.
bottom.topright: We will go hand in hand on this journey whenever you need us: as you know, good stories never end.

manifest.cocreate: Together we will co-create your brand with a story full of passion, effort, creativity and strategy.
manifest.wewant: We want to be part of your brand, of your history. We want to feel things, and all of them good!

pometa.claim:

we have all the properties of the queen fruit: the apple! We savor our work with bites, with passion!
